full_description:
Arctic P12 PWM PST ARGB 120mm 3 in 1 Casing Fan

The Arctic P12 PWM PST ARGB 120mm 3 in 1 Casing Fan Set provides a dynamic and effective cooling solution for PC enthusiasts. Each fan has a speed range of 200 to 1800 rpm, controlled by PWM PST, and a complete stop function at 5% PWM for ultra-quiet operation. These fans have an airflow of 56.30 cfm (95.70 m³/h) and a static pressure of 2.20 mmH2O, ensuring excellent cooling in various settings. The fans are designed to work at ambient temperatures ranging from 0 to 40 °C and have a low noise level of 0.3 sone, due to their unique fluid dynamic bearings, which also increase longevity. The conventional fan frame design is enhanced with ARGB lighting, which adds bright aesthetics to any setup. The electrical features include a normal voltage of 12 V DC, a starting voltage of 3.9 V, and a current flow of 0.1 A. Each fan has a 400 mm cable with a 4-pin connection and a 4-pin socket for more flexibility and convenience of installation. The Arctic P12 PWM PST ARGB 120mm 3 in 1 Casing Fan Set is a fantastic alternative for people looking for a cooling solution that combines performance and aesthetics.

Optimised for Static Pressure

During the development of the new P12 PWM PST, a concentrated airstream was prioritized, resulting in a high static pressure. The fan ensures exceptionally effective cooling, even with increasing air resistance. As a result, the P12 PWM PST is best suited for usage on heatsinks and radiators.

Strong Cooling Performance

Numerous enhancements, such as upgraded engine technology and a newly created fan design, have significantly improved the performance of P fans. In internal performance testing set to 28 dB(A), the new P-fans outperformed numerous competitors.

More Efficient Technology

The motor is driven by a new generation PWM IC, allowing the P12 PWM PST to run considerably more effectively than its predecessors. This saves energy without reducing performance.

Maximum Quietness, Minimum Vibration

Even at low speeds, the new ARCTIC motor produces very little noise. Because of sinus magnetization, the new motor produces only around 5% of the vibration caused by the commutation of a standard DC motor without a filter. As a result of the new motor's consistent and smooth torque, rubber spacers are unnecessary.

full_description:
Arctic P12 Max 120mm Casing Fan

The Arctic P12 Max 120mm Single Casing Cooling Fan is designed for maximum cooling efficiency and quiet operation. It has a wide fan speed range of 200 to 3300 rpm, which is governed via PWM control, allowing for exact changes based on thermal needs. Surprisingly, it may reach 0 rpm when the PWM signal is less than 5%, ensuring complete quiet under low-load situations. This fan has a high maximum airflow of 81.04 cfm (137.69 m³/h). Its high static pressure rating of 4.35 mmH2O makes it very effective at overcoming resistance, making it perfect for use in circumstances where air must be forced through small spaces or thick radiators. Despite its strong performance, the Arctic P12 Max has a low noise output of only 0.6 sone, owing to its sophisticated design and fluid dynamic bearing, which also increases its durability and dependability. The fan runs at a usual voltage of 12 V DC and requires a starter voltage of 3.9 V DC, using 0.29 A of current when operating. The fan comes with a 400 mm cord, which allows for a variety of installation arrangements within a PC chassis. It connects via a 4-Pin PWM connector, ensuring extensive compatibility with contemporary motherboards and fan controllers. The Arctic P12 Max 120mm Single Casing Cooling Fan's mix of performance, efficiency, and low noise makes it a fantastic choice for both enthusiasts and regular users looking for superior cooling solutions.

Virtually Silent due Fluid Dynamic Bearing

The P12 Max also has ARCTIC's tried-and-true Hydrodynamic Bearing. This allows for nearly quiet operation at low speeds, which consumers have requested. At top speeds, raw performance is still assured. Although these bearings tend to wear out, ARCTIC does not compromise on durability and continues to offer a 6-year warranty.

Extremely Wide Speed Range

The P12 Max has customizable speeds ranging from 200 rpm to 3300 rpm. This allows for silent operation in low-airflow situations, as well as exceptional performance on heatsinks and radiators. The P12 Max significantly improves the performance of traditional air and water cooling methods.

Maximum Performance - Without Compromises

The P12 Max provides targeted airflow and high static pressure, making it suited for every setting. The fan is ideal for use with radiators, heat sinks, pinholes, and mesh. As a result, the P12 Max is the ideal fan for enthusiasts and professionals seeking high performance and a long service life.

0dB Mode - Zero RPM

The fan speed may be reduced to a halt using PWM. This enables for quiet operating in IDLE while still ensuring maximum performance when necessary. Thus, the P12 Max allows for astonishingly dynamic speed adjustment, ensuring that the airflow is properly controlled in every scenario.

Maximum Smoothness, Minimum Vibration

Because of sinus magnetization, the new motor of P12 Max produces only around 5% of the vibration during commutation of a standard DC motor without a filter. The rubber pads positioned at the corners help to absorb the remaining vibrations created by the greater revolutions.
